short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add keywords to blacklist. Urls (& Titles) containing keywords will no longer be saved in your history or autocomplete suggestions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No longer worry about embarrassing autocomplete suggestions while you're typing in the search bar.

No more incognito, No more clearing of browsing history. 

Surf with relief!  

to hide icon: right click icon -> click 'hide button'
to show icon: type 'chrome://extensions' in search bar, press 'show button'
